response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,500,000, but we believe it could be an even greater asset in your hands. We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a significant discount, allowing you to benefit from its true worth while securing a substantial saving. We trust that you will appreciate its unique qualities and find it to be an invaluable addition to your collection or business. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
